articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Gain as US CPI Fuels Fed Cut Bets: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Stocks rose to a record after an in-line US inflation reading bolstered speculation the Federal Reserve will have room to cut interest rates in September.
articles.content:
Stocks rose to a record after an in-line US inflation reading bolstered speculation the Federal Reserve will have room to cut interest rates in September.
The MSCI All Country World Index rose 0.1% … [+346 chars]
